message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than $95. How about we split the difference and settle at $102?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still think $95 is a fair price for the product. Let's try to meet in the middle. How about $98?
